8. Gardening.--"If possible, the home should be out of the city, where the children can have 
                                                                           7
ground to cultivate. Let them each have a piece of ground of their own; and as you teach them how to make a garden, how to prepare the soil for seed, and the importance of keeping all the weeds pulled out, teach them also how important it is to keep unsightly, injurious practices out of the life. Teach them to keep down wrong habits as they keep down the weeds in their gardens."-- Counsels, p. 124.
